TopicTitle: Game Freezes on loading on MAC (1.9)

Articles.Content:
I have a fresh install of the newest update (1.9) with no mods. Freezes on loading screen. There is no picture and no text. The yellow loading bar is always filled halfway.

It never loads and is stuck.

No log because it does not crash.
Found a fix. Download the .pkg file instead of the .zip if you have this problem
